column4: In which file can i put my wireless settings? I set them in /etc/pcmcia/network.opts, but it doesnt change the settings after a reboot pcmcia stop/start
/etc/network/interfaces or use the gui tool in your computer->system tools  menu
that 's for the IP settings, not the wireless ESSID/key/...
here is a example with WLAN settings: http://www.ubuntulinux.org/support/documentation/howto/ndiswrapper/
are there lm-sensors binaries/sources in ubuntu or should I compile it by myself?
